S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-3270 Delayed (on-demand) creation of current user schema makes select from view belonging to other schema fail.
Fixed with patch derby-3270-dhw-3. This temporarily sets the default current schema back to what it was at the time of definition of the schema. This need also exsts in other places, so a general mechanism to do this was factored in and used in all such places.
New testcase added.
